sen.j: ゲンゼスキー場（ゲンゼスキーじょう）は、京都府福知山市（旧夜久野町）にあるスキー場である。
sen.e: Genze Ski Resort is a ski resort located in Fukuchiyama City, Kyoto Prefecture (the former Yakuno-cho).

sen.j: 1951年（昭和36年）に開設され、小規模ではあるが、ファミリー向けの穴場のスキー場である。
sen.e: It was opened in 1951, and although small in size, it is a ski resort intended for families, and it is a place not many people know about.

sen.j: しかし、降雪量は多くなく、道路網の発達などとともに他のスキー場へと客足が遠のき、営業停止のシーズンが続いている（夜久野町商工会）。
sen.e: However, there were not much snowfall, and as the road systems developed, customers went to other ski resorts, and seasons in which business is being closed continue ().

However, since it was taken away business by other ski resorts due to light snowfall and the development of the road network and so on, it has been suspended operations for several seasons (Yakuno Town Commerce and Industry Association).
